experiences.title: System Engineer
experiences.subtitle: FN Herstal - Liège, Belgium
workDescription: Led the development and management of three key subsystems (Display, Control Handle, Control Panel) for a next-generation Remote WeaponStation to ensure performance and delivery targets are met.
Managed supplier relationships, conducting weekly alignment meetings to track prototypes, resolve issues, and align on timelines.
Coordinated cross-functional efforts across engineering, testing, and integration teams to validate subsystem functionality prior to full systemrollout.

experiences.title: System Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Toyota Motor Europe - Brussels, Belgium
workDescription: Led multiple illuminated component integrations for new Toyota and Lexus models, balancing strategic planning with hands-on execution tomeet launch and quality targets.
Performed technical feasibility analysis of vehicle electrical systems and designed custom circuits to support non-standard integrations.
Collaborated cross-functionally with installation and testing teams to ensure successful on-vehicle implementation and validation ofcomponents.
